channel.title: Opens swiftswitch and chooses rs or rsc
channel.description: meh what the title says. I will add worlds but it will take a shit load of bitmaps. plz tell me if there is any1 lzy enough who wants me to do this and rate this script #/10 [scar] program Phonnygoblinscoolscriptwhichopensswiftswitchandimtryingtomakealongname; const lagtime = 10;//how many seconds does it take to open swiftswitch? rs = true;//false for rsc var bitmapsname, x, y: Integer; bitmapsname2, a, b: Integer; bitmapsname3, c, d: Integer; begin bitmapsname := BitmapFromString(30, 26, 'z78DAA59659AEC3300' + '845B7E40167F84C5ED2FD2FE9C5C155AF8B7168E22BA1CA039C22' + '4CEC06D7561E7EF4DEBB6998DDCB4D3C53D9E18184378EC2112FF' + 'CCFDF8A2E1C622BC9D15671678304215AA4AD18A49FAD2DC98CF6' + '821F3D1938D122B3C6E65D5B32DBC376D26E3D72C9AFED291EC0A' + '7CCB0C6E6634F5A9D60C47EE6354E2DB785B64B75405C4ACB76C3' + '6AE4DD53C86CE1F1CBB52CCC258774D28A7FD13F5B311B78FC76A' + 'D7E5557D542ED5A45B67E255B7882BB96AC6A6925B3641B13F45E' + 'B0E8DF24B22A0AFE466FE1DA50C89919C92B5A334918EFA8E4F68' + 'CAE91CBCA91CCF7A287E537212D5BCE61BF2BF6B3FD2B43D87F13' + '32CB5BA6557EA3CF20F38F0CD15BD5A795F5D9FF924A723B49A48' + 'FAABB4CDF6AC4759FDE5B71E23949EEBE7B783F626375CCE2F934' + '25971C85B8C6B5EC8455F9FD6DD08E8A949CCBB72E466412A6C2D' + '53CFB264C4B0A29542F2BE5CDD07827AC0669EF16F1ADC79D1515' + 'FBD9B3CAEA5FA24391FE68ADAA5779B35519DE0DD26E28E6042A9' + 'C4998AA443CFD90FFA8CC6F39FFC7FD9CC3AC65002D7AB048BDA1' + '108BA33349A913D0E4EE8807A5A792CC718821069AF355C3AAC05' + '3AF5BA3304F4F85CCB4669E614AAFB4274F0B2D6CCB2A9CD278E4' + 'E8EF3922AEE51694DF286D67F5CA0A43AE4598C18E81DEFA99B43' + '0D39E2567B4799C8931BC42CEEB9846D931E21C534C55859C1E9E' + 'E7397BD425776ADD435BC56CF31E4B6E2DB551A8C4D076229B3C5' + '5D5F9488EDECCE7D0482C7750259FBE65DF09FB3D51EEC6559ECF' + 'D57F0315C5FC'); if(findbitmap(bitmapsname, x, y))then begin writeln('kickass this script works') movemousesmooth(x,y); clickmouse(x,y,true); wait(100)//idk what would happen if i dont have this here clickmouse(x,y,true); end; wait(lagtime*1000); writeln('ok were gonna play some rs! i attack u with sword of the dragonfang!'); bitmapsname2 := BitmapFromString(87, 25, 'z78DAED98ED6EEB20' + '0C866FC9DF869F84C0FD5FD271931CA9D33429EAB62A53DC57B21' + 'C63028127403A7DA66E2B9E0F2160611A33754BC1436B7D68E7E1' + '887BEA664A125249422A49482509A93F42029CF87D957FE57E9EA' + '99B249C9FD9CFA55720E17CE9D5784E12AE4642EE0EBF47C26B3B' + 'CBF9994A12FEEE39E1CCBCBF76B73C27BC7F4D78EDEDFB6ACCDFB' + 'F26FCD45327093FB55F240949C299D523BF1DEEB63B7C6716BEB3' + '26E439E19ABAF4793E4978FB174AFEDB9C6B422A49482509A9532' + '440EABE7A2661F753F7D4CE8090A297DD4FDD53222ABE88A9F98A' + '46C0C38ACDC2B6BA94EAE8AD8275E7526DB895EEE0A50C9CB448D' + 'F721A01751934A3269BDB280806151D1814566DDA0D74098B87FF' + 'DF2E3AB69CFEE48F2D93C2AEC687DFC3970FF12D0202868FB61A9' + '6A859500EBBB7EEB0E00205569C5B4E3B221506615C03495C2359' + '643035E8485461A233320B9A471B6BA578726AEAD14463AD56CB5' + '0B1786A658B31E1226E2B352EDAC99835BAC8A48A2B15A987DDC6' + '0A2B893022C66DF671C64E2E1E7116C216A572E4EC91DD5F48450' + 'F3BA84A8BBAC893A2488598A6528CFC6AD177366DFB2CB00899B3' + '8BD9C28B3487C29596476738EC931F33AACD8382E1D182AA77295' + 'A7CFC0379681B1B'); bitmapsname3 := BitmapFromString(91, 26, 'z78DAED9B49B2A330' + '0C86AF848D352D3598FB1FA9798845A79254A793EE4C98BFE2859' + '10DC81F1EE420A1E24D50675BE6A103CB8A591425AB6E42DA7C62' + '1532D4A2E198360B0D1D57C9808A357711052F49C8EF6CF465E89' + '09A7E14F2A3E441B6918543CCE402213474305D21448A74B341C8' + 'D039218A565CA569B118840C9D13E216B55747EFB10C42862E10B' + '2B1B1FEA0CF8390A10B844C2EB1AE7D833A3C9F90E986E39AFD33' + 'FDF6B7F7794BD9FBAEF57C42CC1D429C63CD7F2D21B79C7D07426' + 'E3FFBAFF29FFAECE76B996D1593D1B341C87308B9EF2AAF1A6532' + '12723562F62184DC3742DDDE224726845646B463A326F24DF3905' + 'B78B8AFB6FF370F7953428851199D4C9677EB43EE7B5BAFB5C5F3' + 'FB90479EE28D62AADB3C4440ABF54F24E49131651072FB3C44AAA' + 'CAB9AEF26E45A6F33D6327F2064E2AE8B4C1266DF3DCA3CE2E747' + 'DAEED3E32104DC1419A5D92162AA6FD1937F544C159544829C4DF' + 'D5B0979C19BF87D844CB4681DFB3243E78480A34BC19966E141C8' + 'D055425E140F197A7F4296D850D88E1342A6A1E3EA641EB2F51E3' + 'D564800D719ABEE3BBC6933744CED6C109118282A2F1018529316' + '9AB92A8C6F468EAC6400279A0476423A76993336923B35B9BA91A' + 'EEA40CCA442C8A044C6AA46C1AEC1558A95FC9E421635DFBFB8E1' + '2E6E8A9D420BB3A081B8B2CF6993E95ABCF49269E83AD4AD057BE' + '916D16BF73D674BD3C6D84BA099B7605B9C436D328D49DDD0D7BB' + '34F0A0C6B3EE3D21DA7ACB1D0B15411014EEAD412303426287828' + '5293D80422C0E88B8E66F96606832ED96152BF39EBFD9B4051686' + 'D6A1736B01C17343408A4640D49B83733DC9CF544179DA5301A12' + '5AFC2B354ABE9C9DC45CDC8C3EEEDAD15A872D146CAA2BA9FCD34' + 'DB255B73F3F6897D46BAB69A33DEB597DAF20574F55F5AB28B18E' + '77F95B39EDD7B4020BAFB709BAFFE0294692985'); if(rs)then if(findbitmap(bitmapsname2, a, b))then begin clickmouse(a,b,true); end; if(not(rs))then if(findbitmap(bitmapsname3, c, d))then begin clickmouse(c,d,true); end; end. [/scar]

item.title: Opens swiftswitch and chooses rs or rsc
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

meh what the title says. I will add worlds but it will take a shit load of bitmaps. plz tell me if there is any1 lzy enough who wants me to do this and rate this script #/10
[scar]
program Phonnygoblinscoolscriptwhichopensswiftswitchandimtryingtomakealongname;
const
lagtime = 10;//how many seconds does it take to open swiftswitch?
rs = true;//false for rsc
var
bitmapsname, x, y: Integer;
bitmapsname2, a, b: Integer;
bitmapsname3, c, d: Integer;
begin
bitmapsname := BitmapFromString(30, 26, ‘z78DAA59659AEC3300’ +
‘845B7E40167F84C5ED2FD2FE9C5C155AF8B7168E22BA1CA039C22’ +
‘4CEC06D7561E7EF4DEBB6998DDCB4D3C53D9E18184378EC2112FF’ +
‘CCFDF8A2E1C622BC9D15671678304215AA4AD18A49FAD2DC98CF6’ +
‘821F3D1938D122B3C6E65D5B32DBC376D26E3D72C9AFED291EC0A’ +
‘7CCB0C6E6634F5A9D60C47EE6354E2DB785B64B75405C4ACB76C3’ +
‘6AE4DD53C86CE1F1CBB52CCC258774D28A7FD13F5B311B78FC76A’ +
‘D7E5557D542ED5A45B67E255B7882BB96AC6A6925B3641B13F45E’ +
‘B0E8DF24B22A0AFE466FE1DA50C89919C92B5A334918EFA8E4F68’ +
‘CAE91CBCA91CCF7A287E537212D5BCE61BF2BF6B3FD2B43D87F13’ +
‘32CB5BA6557EA3CF20F38F0CD15BD5A795F5D9FF924A723B49A48’ +
‘FAABB4CDF6AC4759FDE5B71E23949EEBE7B783F626375CCE2F934’ +
‘25971C85B8C6B5EC8455F9FD6DD08E8A949CCBB72E466412A6C2D’ +
‘53CFB264C4B0A29542F2BE5CDD07827AC0669EF16F1ADC79D1515’ +
‘FBD9B3CAEA5FA24391FE68ADAA5779B35519DE0DD26E28E6042A9’ +
‘C4998AA443CFD90FFA8CC6F39FFC7FD9CC3AC65002D7AB048BDA1’ +
‘108BA33349A913D0E4EE8807A5A792CC718821069AF355C3AAC05’ +
‘3AF5BA3304F4F85CCB4669E614AAFB4274F0B2D6CCB2A9CD278E4’ +
‘E8EF3922AEE51694DF286D67F5CA0A43AE4598C18E81DEFA99B43’ +
‘0D39E2567B4799C8931BC42CEEB9846D931E21C534C55859C1E9E’ +
‘E7397BD425776ADD435BC56CF31E4B6E2DB551A8C4D076229B3C5’ +
‘5D5F9488EDECCE7D0482C7750259FBE65DF09FB3D51EEC6559ECF’ +
‘D57F0315C5FC’);
if(findbitmap(bitmapsname, x, y))then
begin
writeln(‘kickass this script works’)
movemousesmooth(x,y);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(100)//idk what would happen if i dont have this here
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
wait(lagtime*1000);
writeln(‘ok were gonna play some rs! i attack u with sword of the dragonfang!’);
bitmapsname2 := BitmapFromString(87, 25, ‘z78DAED98ED6EEB20’ +
‘0C866FC9DF869F84C0FD5FD271931CA9D33429EAB62A53DC57B21’ +
‘C63028127403A7DA66E2B9E0F2160611A33754BC1436B7D68E7E1’ +
‘887BEA664A125249422A49482509A93F42029CF87D957FE57E9EA’ +
‘99B249C9FD9CFA55720E17CE9D5784E12AE4642EE0EBF47C26B3B’ +
‘CBF9994A12FEEE39E1CCBCBF76B73C27BC7F4D78EDEDFB6ACCDFB’ +
‘F26FCD45327093FB55F240949C299D523BF1DEEB63B7C6716BEB3’ +
‘26E439E19ABAF4793E4978FB174AFEDB9C6B422A49482509A9532’ +
‘440EABE7A2661F753F7D4CE8090A297DD4FDD53222ABE88A9F98A’ +
‘46C0C38ACDC2B6BA94EAE8AD8275E7526DB895EEE0A50C9CB448D’ +
‘F721A01751934A3269BDB280806151D1814566DDA0D74098B87FF’ +
‘DF2E3AB69CFEE48F2D93C2AEC687DFC3970FF12D0202868FB61A9’ +
‘6A859500EBBB7EEB0E00205569C5B4E3B221506615C03495C2359’ +
‘643035E8485461A233320B9A471B6BA578726AEAD14463AD56CB5’ +
‘0B1786A658B31E1226E2B352EDAC99835BAC8A48A2B15A987DDC6’ +

‘8BD9C28B3487C29596476738EC931F33AACD8382E1D182AA77295’ +
‘A7CFC0379681B1B’);
bitmapsname3 := BitmapFromString(91, 26, ‘z78DAED9B49B2A330’ +
‘0C86AF848D352D3598FB1FA9798845A79254A793EE4C98BFE2859’ +
‘10DC81F1EE420A1E24D50675BE6A103CB8A591425AB6E42DA7C62’ +
‘1532D4A2E198360B0D1D57C9808A357711052F49C8EF6CF465E89’ +
‘09A7E14F2A3E441B6918543CCE402213474305D21448A74B341C8’ +
‘D039218A565CA569B118840C9D13E216B55747EFB10C42862E10B’ +
‘2B1B1FEA0CF8390A10B844C2EB1AE7D833A3C9F90E986E39AFD33’ +
‘FDF6B7F7794BD9FBAEF57C42CC1D429C63CD7F2D21B79C7D07426’ +
‘E3FFBAFF29FFAECE76B996D1593D1B341C87308B9EF2AAF1A6532’ +
‘12723562F62184DC3742DDDE224726845646B463A326F24DF3905’ +
‘B78B8AFB6FF370F7953428851199D4C9677EB43EE7B5BAFB5C5F3’ +
‘FB90479EE28D62AADB3C4440ABF54F24E49131651072FB3C44AAA’ +
‘CAB9AEF26E45A6F33D6327F2064E2AE8B4C1266DF3DCA3CE2E747’ +
‘DAEED3E32104DC1419A5D92162AA6FD1937F544C159544829C4DF’ +
‘D5B0979C19BF87D844CB4681DFB3243E78480A34BC19966E141C8’ +
‘D055425E140F197A7F4296D850D88E1342A6A1E3EA641EB2F51E3’ +
‘D564800D719ABEE3BBC6933744CED6C109118282A2F1018529316’ +
‘9AB92A8C6F468EAC6400279A0476423A76993336923B35B9BA91A’ +
‘EEA40CCA442C8A044C6AA46C1AEC1558A95FC9E421635DFBFB8E1’ +
‘2E6E8A9D420BB3A081B8B2CF6993E95ABCF49269E83AD4AD057BE’ +
‘916D16BF73D674BD3C6D84BA099B7605B9C436D328D49DDD0D7BB’ +
‘34F0A0C6B3EE3D21DA7ACB1D0B15411014EEAD412303426287828’ +
‘5293D80422C0E88B8E66F96606832ED96152BF39EBFD9B4051686’ +
‘D6A1736B01C17343408A4640D49B83733DC9CF544179DA5301A12’ +
‘5AFC2B354ABE9C9DC45CDC8C3EEEDAD15A872D146CAA2BA9FCD34’ +
‘DB255B73F3F6897D46BAB69A33DEB597DAF20574F55F5AB28B18E’ +
‘77F95B39EDD7B4020BAFB709BAFFE0294692985’);
if(rs)then
if(findbitmap(bitmapsname2, a, b))then
begin
clickmouse(a,b,true);
end;
if(not(rs))then
if(findbitmap(bitmapsname3, c, d))then
begin
clickmouse(c,d,true);
end;
end.
[/scar]
